issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: In IE 11 , the color display is not proper for the scheduler . In other browser it is showing correctly.
fields.summary: Scheduler page does not render RGBA color combinations in IE11

This message was automatically generated.

Thanks [~mohdshahidkhan] for updating the patch.
nit : Can you change the color combination with below hex values, just to make the change from rgba to hex color transparency remains same.
background:rgba(255, 140, 0, 0.8)  -->  background:#FFA333
background:rgba(50, 205, 50, 0.8)  -->  background:#5BD75B
background:rgba(0,0,0,0.25)        -->     background:#BfBfBf 
background:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) --> background:#fefefe

+1 lgtm, test failures are related to YARN-3954.
verified in IE11,IE10 and IE9 and are working fine.
I will commit it tomorrow if no objection.
Comitted to branch-2/trunk. thanks [~mohdshahidkhan] for contributions!!
